website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, these slide sandals are a must-have for the warm season for active men who like Nikes and a budget-friendly price.
pros: Though they fall on the lower end of the price scale, these athletic sandals have features that rival costlier options
Comfortable foam midsole, lightweight structure and lined strap with the iconic Nike logo
cons: Material is a bit stiff at first, requiring a break-in period
Sizes run on the small side, so you may have order up half to a full size larger than usual

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought those 6 weeks ago and the synthetic leather strap separated already. Looks like sewed on, but is cheap made in China glue. $25 down the drain
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Black/Red - Recd Maroonish Brown
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the black/red but received ones with a maroonish/brown sole and orangish letters... Disappointed since it did not match the product description and images, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and still rocking!!!. I love it
customer_reviews.author: kodua daniel

customer_reviews.title: They wear out really quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The strap fit for the first day. Then it stretched. That probably would have killed a couple stars, but what really does it for me is the molded base. It's too firm to mold to my foot and too flat. I don't have high arches, but in normal use, the heel slides to the inside of my foot, and I end up walking on the outside of it. Because the strap is loose, I have to constantly kick the toe of the slide up, and in a week, they're already showing signs of a lot of wear. I've worn them maybe a dozen times, probably 12 hours in total.
customer_reviews.author: Camryn Bell

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality sandals, that's clear, but a bit too tight on bigger sizes
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality sandals, that's clear. One of the best ones in terms of durability and finishing. That said, on bigger sizes like 12, it becomes too narrow on the width, I had to try to stretch it out which will compromise the structure in order to use this regularly. My friend have the same one size 9 and I got size 12 and I can see that both of them have exact the same width. But still, very good sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Dave The Drummer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: My husband owned an old pair that he purchased from a sporting store. After 2+ years of use they literally split in half (the funniest thing I've ever seen), but he was refusing to let them go. He duct taped them everyday 😂. I finally thought to myself, if hes not going to buy himself a new pair then I will! I was surprised to see them come in an actual nike box. I was so excited to gift him these since they were well needed 😂. Great quality as well. Excellent experience.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: If you wear a wide shoe don’t waste your money on these. These things are very narrow and barley stay on my feet. Tried to find these in a wide width but apparently Nike doesn’t make these is wide (or any Sandals for that matter). Quality of theses seem nice and I want to wear but like I said they barley slide on my feet and won’t stay on while walking around
customer_reviews.author: Beckham13

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously narrow for a size 12
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand how anyone can look at that shoe before it leaves the factory and actually believe it will fit a person that wears a size 12 shoe. It is 3.5 inches wide and 2.5 inches tall at the highest point. They got one thing right. It's 12 inches long. Buyer beware. If you wear a size 12 this shoe is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: ac1957

customer_reviews.title: THEY SMELL TERRIBLE AFTER A MONTH
customer_reviews.text: I thought the sandal was made of rubber all around. Turns out it's foam on the inside of the sole. Is this a huge issue? No. It apparently makes them more comfortable. But the foam tends to absorb everything. Haven't had them for even a month and they smell terrible. I don't typically have foot odor issues either so it's not something I'll buy again. Plus the foam will likely not last nearly as long. But whatever - they're decent for what they are so I'll give them 3 stars. Just very disappointed because they look cool and I wish they were better quality. Also, just a tad on the snug side.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Breitenbach

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow and not sure if these are authentic Nike
customer_reviews.text: These slides are very narrow. I have narrow feet and have never had to wear a wide fitting show, ever. And these are even too narrow for my feet. Also, they don’t fit right and slide off to the side of my feet when I walk. I suspect these are not authentic Nike slides.
customer_reviews.author: Leezy321

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 in womens and thats what i got. They feel like they wont fit when you first put them on but after a few days of wear theyre super comfy and loose enough to be more comfortable. But still snug enough to not be tripping and slipping out of your shoes i wear thick socks with them or bare feet either way they still fit and are comfortable . Bought them in December and have been wearing them pretty much every day its now may and they still are in top condition. I will definitely recommend these and re order when mine are done.
customer_reviews.author: ashley reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and don’t buy them! Go to sports Academy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly we absolutely hated them. Not true size. My husband is a 11 and I order a 12 just be on the safe side and they still didn’t fit. They were too small, not enough width and not true size and over priced! You can buy them for a better online at Sports Academy for 26 bucks and free shipping over 25. The only reason why I kept them is because my husband walked outside with them trying to give them a chance. So I had to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Lo

customer_reviews.title: Sucks need a whole size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Did not get what was pictured on my order however it did say black/white... but they just don't fit I got them for my son which we pretty much have the same size foot. he was complaining about them being too small so I tried them on and they are so tight and uncomfortable bc of the size issue everyone else is complaining about. I can see that they may be a good shoe but the sizing is all wrong and I'm disappointed with the fact that the image I purchase doesn't at all match the show I received.
customer_reviews.author: mike fey

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and not good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit 2 sizes too small. And if you have wide feet. Forget about it. You gonna looked liked sausages stuffed in a bun. Decent for the price and for being Nike. But it might do you good to spend a litTle more and invest in better fitting ones.
customer_reviews.author: TheHenrys2003

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Tight Around the Band
customer_reviews.text: I still give it a 5 stars because for a person with a normal width foot, the band isn't TOO tight but it was tight enough to notice. However I'm sure it'll expand slightly within time to accommodate my foot, as all my other slides did. Not as comfortable as some of my Adidas slides but the construction and material on the Nike ones seem better, especially at the points of connection for the band and bottom part of the slide. They look great, feel good, cost relatively nothing. Great pick up!
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: Return to Slender
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow and tight on the band. It's like they forgot that the longer a foot is, the bigger it is, so while the size 16 was long enough, I was like Cinderella's fat step-sister trying to jam my foot into the crystal slipper. Marked it for a return but ran out of the time window, so now I carry them around in my truck looking for someone with abnormally slender feet for a size 16 - maybe Slenderman or something. From wicked step-sister to gross Prince Charming. Thanks, Nike design squad! 😤
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not reenacting Jason and the Argonauts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair of size 12 flip flops. Delivery was quick, but there was only one shoe. So I tried on the flip without the flop and, unfortunately, it fit snugly. I have already requested a replacement and hope the next box has two shoes that are a marginally wider. Nike’s have always run narrow for me. I’d suggest going up a size if you have wide feet. I wish I had done an unboxing to catch my surprise at a single shoe.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Best Slides Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he LOVES them! I even try and sneak them sometimes because they are so comfortable. The underneath of the strap is soft and cushioned. You don't have to worry about rubbing your skin raw on the top of your foot if you are bare foot. Caught them on sale for an unbelievable price, but would definitely pay full price on next pair if not on sale. Definitely recommend these for anyone looking for slides!
customer_reviews.author: andrea carney

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5 so I thought it would be better safe than sorry to get the wrong size. I ordered a size 10 thinking it would be ok but they're a bit too small and the top piece is a little tight. I would say order a size or a size and a half bigger than what you actually wear. A 10.5 or 11 would've fit me much better than the 10 did.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pricing was the cheapest I could find on Amazon. I’m a prime member and didn’t have to pay for shipping. My son loves these. They are durable. The last pair he had somebody stole them but before that he had over a year wearingbthem day in and day out and they still was in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Roz B

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: At first it had too much support, felt a lot of pressure in the arch of my foot. Got over that, it feels good now. It kind of naturally tries to turn in a little, but look guys it’s fine. As lo ng as you get the right size, it’ll do, it’s a slipper. I like this style over the ones that ride in the web of your big toe and next toe, those things have me walking like a duck. This one reliably stays on my foot without me having to flex my toes to keep the darn thing from flying off. I hate slippers
customer_reviews.author: NickG

customer_reviews.title: Cute slides but too tight
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for comfortable flip flops forever. Most women's flip flops are uncomfortable and cut my feet. My brother has this pair of Nike slides and they are so comfortable and don't look too masculine that I couldn't get a pair myself! The shoe was technically the correct size, however the strap that goes over the top was too tight. I could barely slide my foot into the shoe and every time I walk my feet get pushed out of the shoe entirely. Other than it not fitting, the shoe is great! Just wish it fit better in smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Perini

customer_reviews.title: Glad I went with these
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on different slide on sandals, as I wanted to find the most comfortable pair. I am glad my research led me to these. These sandals were very affordable and are very comfortable. They slide on with ease, and feel great to walk around in. I don't often wear sandals a lot, so I didn't want to break the bank on a pair, so this was perfect for my needs. These feel great barefoot, or when walking around the house or outside real quick, with socks. I would very much recommend these sandals to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: Nike Slide Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Nice sandal. Quality seems great. After reading the reviews I ordered a size up. My husband wears a 10 and I ordered an 11. Too small! They don’t fit at all. Will have to order a 12.
customer_reviews.author: Lace86

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit, but length is ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a shower slide for work and gym. I am a 10.5 in pretty much everything and bought an 11. It fits length wise for me, but the "strap" is very tight over my foot. I was thinking maybe it would loosen over time with use, but it has not. I typically do not have high arches, or "fat" feet that would cause this to be tight. Pretty much impossible to wear with socks, unless you want your feet to fall asleep. I am keeping them, but not very happy with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Giantsfan510

customer_reviews.title: Too small, not even worth the low price
customer_reviews.text: Terrible fit. Looks and feels absurdly cheap. Instant return. Last time buying Nike slides as they've seemed to raise prices since my last purchase 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: emf

customer_reviews.title: For the price definitely do it!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my friend got these to wear at the gym, we both wear large sizes (11,13) and both had a similar experience. The sole is not cushiony at all, I mean it honestly feels like a hard plastic with no flex. But the biggest downside is the loop that fits on your foot is tiiiiiight, I’ve had these for over a month now and they are still tight, this happened with my friend too. But, still gave 4 stars because although they may feel bad, they are cheap so I can’t complain!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Taddoni

customer_reviews.title: I think they're fake
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe the item I received are a real Nike product. They feel extremely lightweight and cheap. The soles are made out of this hard air filled plastic and not the rubber sole that nike slides normally have.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon signal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful buy .
customer_reviews.text: I waited for this order a bit and I was getting very annoyed , because my son wanted his slides ( he calls them) as if they were an emergency since all his friends have them lol . I didn’t get them the date they were suppose to be deliver but they were worth the wait because he loves those slippers he’s 12 and a size 7 for men and they fit him perfect . I also got a 6 packs of nikeys short socks on amazon here as well . very small price when you get to earn “ best MoM title “ lollll ...
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: These run way too small to be the real thing. If you wear a size 12 or higher don't even bother.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a few months back and only wore them on the porch a few times over the summer but I'm starting to realize that these run very small...I ordered a size 13 in case a 12 was too small and the 13 fits like an 11. I went to my dad's house and he had a similar pair he got from the nike store and they fit much better but his are a size 11..... I wish I paid more attention to the fit because I would have returned these.... they seem to be a good knockoff version of the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A HASSLE TO FIND THE RIGHT FIT❗😡
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 9, I ordered a size 9, length was perfect, but strap was way too tight. I returned it and ordered a size 10. The strap is just right but now it's over one inch too long. I'm going to try 9 1/2. If it doesn't fit right, I'm going to Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Smercyzanski

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Pic is a side by side of my previous size 12 from 5 years ago against this new "size 13". Maybe they have changed drastically over the past 4 or 5 years since I bought the ones I needed to replace but these are definitely not true to size. I order a men's 12 and couldn't get my foot though them. Returned them for a 13 and my foot barely fits....wearing socks with them is completely out of the question. Construction looks ok.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I want but satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect...I thought the arch piece was adjustable but it’s not. So when walking my right heal aims toward the left somewhat a little off the Sandel But after looking for what I really want..the prise is too crazy. I’ll keep what I have & im happy with it. Oh arrived next day as advertised 👍🏿 **Just a note to add - changed my mind...decided to return them for an adjustable pair. Again they are nice but just not for me & I’m just not going to settle. I also have to say the return policies are great - they make it soo easy to make returns these days, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: RobD

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately damaged my air jordan slip ons and was looking for a replacement when I ordered these. I ordered size 11 which is slightly larger than my shoe size as others said to order bigger. The band that holds your foot down doesn't seem to care how big your feet are though as the only thing the size changes is the length of the sandal. No doubt the complaints of the band tearing has to do with this too. Get sandals with an adjustable band, like the air jordans.
customer_reviews.author: J. Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to purchase these slippers after seeing mixed reviews, but it turns out that they work well for me. I have narrow feet and need arch support and these slippers provide me with both. I can understand, however, why folks with wider feet may not feel that these shoes are comfortable. The fit is snug on a narrow foot, so I'd only recommend these shoes to someone who has narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mica B.

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet, do not order these sandals.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 10 (typical for sandals) and my feet will not even slide into these. The shoes are too narrow and the sole is rough on the foot. I prefer the comfort slide style. Do not recommend if you have wide feet or feet that may swell during the heat/day.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Small to size
customer_reviews.text: We ended up having to exchange a size 4 for a size 6, and the size 6 was a perfect fit to foot. We probably could've even gone up to a size 7. My 10 yr. old wears a 3 1/2-4 normally. So just order ATLEAST a couple sizes up from true size when making your purchase! Other than that, he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Buffin

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. At first I was upset bc of didn't fit well. But thought back and maybe I need to break in the sandal. So did that and that was when sandal for like a glove. Top part was stiff in the beginning but broke in and felt good afterwards. No complaints and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Tran

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable feet!
customer_reviews.text: Not very good. Feet do not stay straight in them. Always slide to one side. Would never by again!
customer_reviews.author: sandiegohombre

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. The slide sideways on his feet and he can't walk in them. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit really weird at first. Possible sample sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure these are sample buy back sandals. When I received mine the left sandal was almost stretched out so badly it would literally work it self sideways after 2 steps on my foot. I’ve had these for like 3 months so they have finally stretched to fit my feet better. But at first these were almost unwearable they were so mismatched the left sandal was really weird. The right one was perfectly fine. I’m hapoy with them now but really was tempted to send these back when I first got them.
customer_reviews.author: Curt_32

customer_reviews.title: Love these slides
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these a few years ago and they've held up really well, they just got so dirty I couldn't wear them out much. These are apparently the same slides, but they have the word nike printed on them instead of just the swoosh. I really hope they didn't change any part of the construction of the slides because if they didn't these will last me a good long time. And yes, they are a little snug at first but they loosen up as you wear them
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected based on reviews
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good slide to wear around the house and based on the reviews it should have been. I normally wear a 9.5-10 sneaker so I upsized to an 11 to compensate for what the other reviewers said was a snug fit. If you have a wide foot, there are not for you, even with the upsizing these are too tight and my feet got hot and uncomfortable in them. The sole has little nubs on them which when combined with the tight fit, make these almost unwearable. I wish I had not gotten ride of the box as these would be going back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pollina

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size. Not authentic.
customer_reviews.text: TOTALLY AND COMPLETELY FAKE!!!!!! Nike would NEVER EVER have soles that looked like these. The fact that these things are wayyy too small and not even close to being "true to size" as you all state, well that also confirms that these are definitely not an authentic pair. As a serious "sneakerhead" I know these are not authentic for a number of reasons, and for you to sell them as though they are and give potential buyers the idea that they are, well that is not cool at all........
customer_reviews.author: Emad

customer_reviews.title: Product approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. She loves them. She uses them to walk around the house and for other quick errands. She’s a 7.5 and I bought these a half size bigger than her normal size which worked out because they ended up being an exact fit. I plan on buying another pair for my son.
customer_reviews.author: missbratpak3

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item worked
customer_reviews.text: Well, this good review is for the wrong item. I thought I had ordered incorrectly but from what I see I definitely ordered men's size 9. Good thing I wear a women's size 9 because that's what I got. They are a great fit, comfortable and great to slip on and go. I didn't need a new pair of slides though, my son did so now I will just order direct to be sure to get men's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha

customer_reviews.title: Watch out! Picture shown does not match color description.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black slide the picture showed black slide but I received black and white slide. I go back to check what I ordered and the picture IS a black slide BUT the color description says black/white. Picture and color description does not match. Also husband said they were not comfortable, it was like walking on the hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hard cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Made of hard cheap plastic. Feels like the 5$ flip flops you buy at a dollar store type place. No cushion and uncomfortable. Rarely am misled by amazon reviews but i have no idea what everyone is talking about with these. I bought a pair of under armour ones a couple years ago that are much more comfortable. Just wanted a second pair, guess I'll buy another set of those instead
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: Normally don't do reviews. But im a wide foot size 12 in women's and 10 in mens. I orginally ordered a size 11 and they were too narrow and squished the top of my feet. I ordered a size 13 and that worked WAY better than the size 11. Im leaving 4 starts cause the quality is great. The arch support in the slipper is good for my foot that had reconstructive surgery. Wouldve been 5 if it didnt run so small.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Ruiz/Yulonda Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfort slides!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for around the house or doing quick errands! I was very surprised to feel how comfortable these were since other slides I've had were very hard. These are very soft and light. Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Solis

customer_reviews.title: Run small/ maybe cheaper in store
customer_reviews.text: They were nice, looked as expected/shown. But they are narrow. The Mr. has wide feet so I returned them. I read all the reviews and ordered one size bigger but they were still small. I was going to exchange them but when I clicked on the size 14 I needed they went up another $10... so I returned them... I used amazons return to khols option and they gave me a 25% off Coupon... where I found the slides $5 cheaper before the 25% off. All in all it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna_72

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought Nike slides for my son and husband without problems. I bought these for my son in anticipation of summer. Now that ita finally here he wore them a few times and they are already falling apart!! Definitely won't last the summer, probably not even a week more just around the yard. VERY disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: vallyj1

customer_reviews.title: Wide Feet, Order a Size Up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as replacement for husband (do not leave outside in the sun, they will shrivel, through no fault of their own). Both times I've ordered these they are pretty much as expected. My husband has wide feet so with the padded band I order him a full size up and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TheAwkwardSuccubus

customer_reviews.title: Not made for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The look of the slides are appealing but when I went to try them on, I had to push my foot in just to get them on. They felt comfortable at first then as I began to walk, I developed a cut on my toe. I guess my feet were swollen and it rubbed up against the top of the slides. Besides that, I love the Nike graphic sign and the design of the slides. I might have to just break them in somehow. If you have wide or swollen feet, do not purchase these!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Q.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift and were only worn a few times a week. The sides are glued, not stitched and popped off after a month of casual use. Totally unacceptable. He had a pair before this that lasted over a year. A refund or replacement should be offered, but all I'm not being given that option because the return window closed on January 31.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen T. Shay

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit on one foot - poor quality control?
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this is about having unusual or not have symmetrical feet. The right foot never fit well. I am constantly loosing that sandal and I have tried and tried to see if I could correct the problem by "stretching" the loop around my foot. Nothing has worked and I have owned these for a long time. Not the way I wanted to spend my money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Piller

customer_reviews.title: and they are not all that comfortable. I don't have an overly wide foot either
customer_reviews.text: Much too small, I wish they fit well, they are very thin and actually quite hard to walk with. I thought over time they would stretch out enough, and they haven't really. I bit disappointing with this purchase. Just an FYI these run slim, and they are not all that comfortable. I don't have an overly wide foot either. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Winchester S.

customer_reviews.title: Just warp it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and was quite comfortable but was not durable. We left the sandals outside the house for a couple of days and it warped like a contortionist after exposure to the sun. My $5 sandals from Target were more durable and didn’t warp at all despite being left under sun and rain for longer periods.
customer_reviews.author: mrgel

customer_reviews.title: Good slide, don’t know why they’re $10 over retail
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my fiancé. He has had them before and likes the fit. Everything about the shoe is fine, but msrp is $30 on the tags, but was charged $39. Little bit of a bummer I would’ve just gone to the outlet near me or ordered directly from Nike. Don’t understand why price was so high, they’re not a discontinued item.
customer_reviews.author: natawhat

customer_reviews.title: Good for thw price just took longer to ship.
customer_reviews.text: it took a bit longer to ship than i tought, my husband loves them i tried to post the review before but for some reason they did not let me i dont know if they want positive reviews only. They are light weight , comfortable and run a little smaller but still good. They took like 10 days to ship thats my only complaint but after shipping it just took like 14 hrs to deliver. ANY UPDATESAFTER WEARING THEM FOR 2 WEEKS OR A MONTH I WILL POST LATER I JUST HOPE AMAZON LET ME .
customer_reviews.author: jenny perez

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: We bought the same pair at the store and the fit and comfort was totally different. So when I purchased these I figured it was the same only saved a trip from going to the mall. Wrong! They run small, way more tight, doesn't even have the same grip. We made sure both were the same brand and type. It says so but isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful odor after 5 weeks of usage
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking sandals that I used as shower shoes. After 6 weeks I began to smell an awful odor from my gym bag. It was the sandals which I carefully dried every day after the gym. I have never had a foot odor problem and I work out 5-6 times a week. I Cannot get the odor out—tried everything including hot water washing and mold detergent. I will throw them out—what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Myers

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend to take on a beach vacation. The picture didn't match the one that we bought. I mean it is my fault because I didn't go to the next picture or really read the description in depth. But then he couldn't even wear them, his foot kept sliding and he said if he wore them any longer he would end up with blisters?!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Layton

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality material
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend a few months ago as a gift because he loves Nike! I was a little disappointed in the material quality of the sandal because the bottom feels like a cheap weightless plastic. I had expected the bottoms to be a sturdy soft rubber but they weren’t. The price did not match the quality, although they looked better than dollar store flip flops. He enjoyed them a lot and they aren’t ugly or anything just not the type of material we were expecting to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last as long as I had hoped for... but I would repurchase an give them another try
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if they are just held up by some form of glue on the sides. But my son wore them less than a month an the sides were spitting. He has 2 other pairs not purchased online that are still holding up. Would give them another try because he's a teenager an rough on shoes, the price was comparable to what's in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree A.

customer_reviews.title: Barefoot is probably more comfortable....
customer_reviews.text: they feel almost like walking barefoot , so i'd say as comfortable as walking with thin socks on a concrete floor, and as slippery as being barefoot to so if your feet get wet they'll slip inside the sandal more than you would on the floor itself, just incredible....
customer_reviews.author: Simple ReviewsTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: You cant go wrong with Nike sandals. Perfect to wear with any casual outfit and anywhere. I wear them around the house and outside. Super comfortable.....I bought them for my boyfriend, so when he's not wearing them I have them on....they are too big but still comfortable. LOL
customer_reviews.author: VALERIE

customer_reviews.title: With thin socks they are still comfortable, BUT for thick socks it might get a ...
customer_reviews.text: I always get a half a size bigger when I buy shoes. As of now I wear size 12 for men and well they fit perfectly. With thin socks they are still comfortable, BUT for thick socks it might get a little tight. I thought the whole sandal would be matte but where the logo subsides it's a little glossy. The bottom is hard contoured plastic that feels durable and comfortable for the feet.
customer_reviews.author: AnonxEst

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 7 Day Cruise
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up as an item I needed to use on a Cruise. These are super light weight, snug, and comfortable. The fabric had to stretch out after a while, they are a bit more snug than other sandals i've owned in the past. They do fit just a little bit smaller than expected. Just keep inserting your feet into them if they don't feel tight enough, after a few days they will stretch and conform. For that reason I'm giving them 4 out of 4 stars. Used them all week on the cruise ship no problem. Currently wear them as quick slip on's to the beach, shower, or grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Corey L

customer_reviews.title: So versatile
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my pair last Wednesday and got them on time today. This is the first time I ever had Nike slides, so I order size 8 because that's what the size chart said. They fit perfectly; after I break them in. I ordered the color called white, the color with a white strap and black sole. I like how versatile the color is. This color works with any socks, sold color or multicolored, and without socks. I wanted these to wear with white socks because it looks super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G.

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE AMONG THE YOUNG AND OLD....
customer_reviews.text: MY DAUGHTER BOUGHT THESE FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER FOR OUR VACATION THIS SUMMER. YOU CAN NEVER GO WRONG WITH THESE SLIDES BY NIKE. THE ONLY THING IS THAT SHE BOUGHT A MENS' SIZE. MY SON N LAW TOOK THEM FOR HIMSELF:). THEY LAST FOREVER. MY OLDEST GRANDDAUGHTER HAS A PAIR FROM HIGH SCHOOL AND SHE IS 25 YEARS OLD!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: More like hard plastic, not rubber.
customer_reviews.text: I had these same slides except they are an older model and made in China. The ones I received are made in indonesia and they are tight and like standing on hard plastic, instead of rubber. Not sure if I am returning, but definitely not what I expected for being a Nike product.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell M.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller fit
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these for my boyfriend and he’s normally a 10.5 or 11 and I ordered 11 and they’re a bit too small. The slippers were also pretty hard and not flexible. That may change as he wears them more but they’re not quite what I expected. They do look like the picture, same color and logo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Came in the Nike box and everything with all the tags. Super happy with these. I was tired of my dad wearing socks with his flip flops. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Rose

customer_reviews.title: Get a full size or size and a half bigger
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 9.5 and I went to size 10 because I knew these were gonna be a little smaller than the size says, but now that I have them I’m thinking I should’ve gone with a size 11 because they’re too tight around the top. Other than that, the cushion is great, the sole is super comfortable, and they seem like they’re gonna last a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Should've ordered a half size up
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 11s in Nike - these seem to fit juuust barely (as you'd want a shoe to fit) but for sandals, you want it a little larger so they don't slip off. I like them but I need to hit my toes to the ground to push them back on all the time when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, high price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable, I ordered a size too big but that’s on me. I thought the strap was adjustable but it’s not. Pretty hard when first bought been trying to break them in around the house. Shipping was super fast even in the midst of this pandemic stuff, I was surprised. Other than the price being over 40$ I think is a little crazy but that’s when you get when you buy the “swoosh” symbol right? Lol
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Nearly squeeze my toes off.
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooooo tight. They are the right length, but too tight to wear. I’ve been trying to stretch them out but when my toes lose feeling and turn blue I have to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri King

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and Quality is on point!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast as usual. Pacakged well. Actually bought these for my daughter who has very wide feet. Womens/kids size did not fit her comfortably. These fit perfect and after about 6 months are in almost new shape still. Plus got a great deal!! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Rating: A-
customer_reviews.text: We’ve all seen these slides everywhere. They’re cheapest and best ones you can buy for the money. I’d say Bc they only come in 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 sizes. (No half sizes), I ordered a size 10, it was a half size big. But not an issue really. Good comfort, support, and value. It’s NIKE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not the best not the worst
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for BJJ to walk around the gym, use in the sauna and showers. For these purposes they’re great but I couldn’t imagine walking around in these the bottom material isn’t the most comfortable. My second issue is that the part that goes over the top of your foot is made up of cushion material that just absorbs moisture whether sweat or water and it stays wet for a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of tea!
customer_reviews.text: As for me, the Benassi's didn't fit well. As someone else explained, they felt like they were walking half on the slide and the other half on the floor. My heels had a tendency to turn inward toward each other. Now, it could be I'm not used to wearing this kind of shoe so I really don't fault the product. I was going to return them but my wife wears this type all of the time and had no problem with them. So she is now the proud owner.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Initially a good pair of sandals. Will not last.
customer_reviews.text: Brought two pairs they were great for a few months and then started falling apart. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: WGDChris

customer_reviews.title: Top part WAY too small
customer_reviews.text: The soul of the sandal fit my boyfriend perfectly but the top band part (where the bike brand is) was WAY too small. He couldn’t even get his foot in it and he doesn’t have unusually large feet or anything. Ordering a size up wouldn’t help either because then the soul would be too big.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: They fit better than most flip flops, and are pretty comfortable and supportive. I had a pair of these I lost about 6 years ago and forgot to replace and I was thrilled to find the quality had stayed consistent after all that time. Great for just chilling but durable enough to be active in if you need to
customer_reviews.author: Harry Bauls

customer_reviews.title: They run extra small, make sure to buy prime for hassle free returns
customer_reviews.text: These products run EXTRA small. I wear a size 9 in regular nike shoes, no special wideness or diameter, just regular size. I bought a 9 sandal and it ran way too small I couldnt even get my foot through the slide, bought a 10 and it feels even smaller. Kinda bummed out cause they seem nice.
customer_reviews.author: King Kolt

customer_reviews.title: ran small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: I missed the window to return because I bought before a vacation. These felt stiff, narrow and uncomfortable according to my teenager who they were purchased for. Went to go online to return and I am past the deadline :(
customer_reviews.author: Robin K.

customer_reviews.title: Husband couldn't get his feet in them
customer_reviews.text: These looked as expected when they arrived but we had to return them because my husband couldn't even get his feet in. Since the top is not adjustable you're feet have to be pretty narrow to fit. Length wise they were right, but I even put my feet into them and it was a tight squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Jena J

customer_reviews.title: Good Price , super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I saw these in several outlet shoe stores and amazon beat the price by several dollars. They are even more comfortable than my Jordan Sandals and don’t leave all those massage dots on the bottom of your feet like The Jordan’s or Addissage. Super Light and comfy all day and quality made. I got black which are pretty stylish and Nike symbol blends in.
customer_reviews.author: Bkslice 🍕

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered! Pictured Black/White
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Black slides with white “Nike” lettering size 14. I received the package on time as I always do but the product doesn’t match the description. I received Black slides with Black impression of “Nike”. I’m greatly disappointed as I know my husband won’t mind but deep down inside he’ll be disappointed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Very poor construction
customer_reviews.text: The shower sandals strap came unglued after 3 months of mild use. Too late for return, also this is second pair that failed like that..first pair lasted about a year, so not a fluke but a flaw in construction of sandal...very disappointed in Nike lack of quality lately Don't buy until they come with a two year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: jim sousa

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Nice slides i bought size 10 and they fit size 10 men perfect ordered them for my husband. I think these are a old stock because the box and font did not compare to some nike benassi royal blue slides that i brought the manufacturer s were different the challange red was from vietnam and the royal blue were from indonesia i could not tell if product was authentic but idnt care i love the nike logo . my husband and his brother loves them
customer_reviews.author: DJena

customer_reviews.title: Too tight!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the correct size and they are much too small. Unfortunately I wore them around the house and now the bottoms are a little scuffed so now I'm stuck with them. Any way to stretch them? Buyer beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dee's opinion

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY The Right Size
customer_reviews.text: These fit! Don't Nikes run narrow? I guess my son has narrow feet now. The soles are substantial. The treads are good. The strap is thick and soft. His feet don't slide through. I am happy not to have to send THESE back. I am deleriously happy that there was no driving around the city in 100 degree weather trying ro find size 15 shoes. Amazon.com is a blessing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved the sandles, extra comfy. I have a pair myself that I always wear and now he has a pair as well. He couldnt stop smiling on how comfortable they are. Would totally purchase the product again. The shipping however took more than it stated it would. Its labeled as "PRIME" but it took about 5 days to ship and then an additional day because it was behind schedule. I would take that into consideration if ordering as a gift as i was..I had to wait a tad longer than I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These slides are incredibly uncomfortable. I get needing to break shoes in but they’re basically just hard plastic. They aren’t slightly comfortable. When you walk you feel as though you struggle to keep them on. I should have known what to expect by the price 😂
customer_reviews.author: C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Seems to run a little small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old son. He wears a 6.5 youth and I ordered a 6.5 men’s originally. I thought they’d be a little big but they were actually perfect, which I didn’t want for my quickly growing child. Returned them and repurchased an 8 I believe and they were perfect, with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom

customer_reviews.title: The fit was small.
customer_reviews.text: It was too tight. When i did manage to fit my feet in them, it caused my feet to sweat and became slippery. Felt like I needed to wear socks with this slipper. Whats the point of slip on shoes in this case. Might as well wear shoes if i have to go through the process of putting on socks. It looked cool and seemed to be well made. Just the fit and cause of sweat that I didn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Bao Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Inauthentic
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of those slippers from multiple brands. This exact one came without a box, which I was fine with. But the surface the material and fabric of it was horrible, they were extremely smaller than the original size, they uncomfortable, and they felt like plastic. I cant return this because of an injury unrelated to this, otherwise I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Yasen

customer_reviews.title: Nice flips
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and bought these in a size 8 and they fit snug. But they look great. I could have probably went a half a size up but I think once I break them in, they'll be just fine. I do love the way they look. Without socks they are honestly great but if I wear them with socks, I think they'll just have to stretch out a little. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Benassi Just Do It Athletic Sandal
product_meta.description: Nike Benassi "Just Do It." Sandal is a lightweight men's sports sandal with the Nike corporate logo embellished on the strap. Its soft midsole foam and jersey lining provide comfort so you can enjoy a relaxed, premium experience.
feature_bullets: SPORTY STYLE: Lightweight sports slide sandal for men with a bold Nike logo embellished on the strap for plush comfort and an athletic look.

CASUAL COMFORT: Sandal has injected Phylon midsole that doubles as an outsole for lightweight cushioning. Its soft midsole foam and jersey lining provide comfort so you can enjoy a relaxed, premium experience.
NATURAL MOTION: Men's Nike slides have flex grooves help the slide move with your foot, while foam outsole provides impact protection.
SPORT SANDAL: Men's slides with one-piece, synthetic leather strap for durability that has jersey lining for a soft feel.
NIKE SLIDES: Imported with synthetic sole
